title: The app isn't working since the last update
body:
Hello, so since the last update, everytime i try to open the app the login page shows up for a short moment disappears, and then i can use the app interface.. except it doesn't show anyone online no message history and i can't log out ,basically it became of no use.
i am using iOS 9.3.5 on iPhone 6

replies.body: Are you still experiencing this with the latest iOS update? We've been actively digging for the root cause of this, and we can't get it to happen to anyone internally.  This makes it really hard for us to figure out what exactly is going on. Would be great to get your direct help in diagnosing the issue!
I have the same problem and id be more than happy to help!

Got it, thanks!  We think we have an idea as to how to resolve this.  We'd actually like to send you (and anyone else on this chain!) a build that we think may fix it, before just pushing it to the wild and crossing our fingers.  I'm checking on what info we would need if you'd be down to help :)
Would love to help! ready for anything :)

Great! You should be getting an invite via email to join our Testflight, and we're working to get a build out.  If you have issues I'll find a way to friend you on EUW (i'm NA) so we can troubleshoot not on a forum :)
Thanks for the invite! got it all running good however the problem is still not fixed, feel free to add me on EUW (Keny). Thank you

Some info worth noting that the problem seems to be connected with my account bec. I tried the app on my second phone still the same reinstalling the app updateing to the latest ios dosent seem to help earthier. Thanks
I have the same problem and it's really annoying
I hv the exact same issue
If you are in SA i have a solution, I've changed my iphone region to U.S and it start working ,
